Welcome to the Future of Safety

The Onshore Safety Alliance (OSA) is a voluntary industry program seekings to drive step-change to eliminate serious injury and fatality (SIF) events in U.S. onshore F&P operations. The program is available to any industry company or organization involbed in Upstream Explorartion and Production Activities including operators contractors and service providers.

Apply for Membership Today!

Join The Alliance

If you're interested in becoming a Program Participant, start here! Find information about how to join the program and what wactions you will need to take as a member

Participants

Become a Participant

The Onshore Safety Alliance (OSA) is a vluntary indsutry program seeking to drive step-change to eliminate serious injury and fatality (SIF) events in U.S. onshore E&P operations. The program is available including operators, contractors, and service providers.
